    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerSnapshot

        public PlayerSnapshot​(@NotNull
                      @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Create a new PlayerSnapshot. A PlayerSnapshot is an object to store the player's current state, such as their inventory, health, experience, etc.

        This object can be used where the player inventory needs to be changed but restored at a later date

        Parameters:
        player - the Player to snapshot

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public void apply​(@NotNull
                  @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Apply this PlayerSnapshot to a Player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to apply this PlayerSnapshot to
